thread.title: President Trump Will Hold a Rally in Florida This Weekend
thread.title_full: President Trump Will Hold a Rally in Florida This Weekend

author: Josh Feldman
title: President Trump Will Hold a Rally in Florida This Weekend
text:
President Trump Will Hold a Rally in Florida This Weekend by Josh Feldman | 5:28   
If you were wondering whether President Trump would continue to hold rallies while in office, you have your answer. 
Trump announced earlier today that he will be holding a rally this Saturday at the Orlando-Melbourne International Airport in Florida: Join me in Florida this Saturday at 5pm for a rally at the Orlando-Melbourne International Airport! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 15, 2017 
And then there’s this tidbit from Sean Spicer : Spicer says Trump rally in FL Saturday is a “campaign” event. So the 2020 campaign has begun. 
— Jim Acosta (@Acosta) February 15, 2017 Spicer on POTUS event on Saturday in FL: “It’s being run by the campaign” 
— Zeke Miller (@ZekeJMiller) February 15, 2017 
[ image via Shutterstock ]
